content: english and japanese versions are fully charted using standard knitting crochet symbols **materials** * japanese size 7/0 crochet hook 4 0mm * 130g 663m color 12 dark khaki * 45g 229 5m color 5 rose pink * 45g 229 5m color 6 amethyst * 40g 204m color 7 violet * 2 circular bamboo purse handles approx 13cm in diameter * 1 piece of gingham fabric for lining 63cm square **note ** entire bag should be crocheted with two strands held together
